message: Say I have video, channel and user resources. When a user watched a video (view event) or subscribed to a channel (subscription event), we would like the fronted to send an event back to the backend. Our team had a discussion on whether it should POST to an event resource or we should PUT to the corresponding resource (video, channel). Thoughts?
It's a new event, so I'd POST to an event resource. Also, since you're using rails, make Event polymorphic
